name: Dream (itch) (Bledyn, umuttaylanduran, ErenBGT)
description:
Game is made for ÜNOG Fall Jam 2021. 

Theme of the jam was Catlike. We didn't beat around the bush and straight made a cat game. 

As a group of students we have tried to deliver a story in 2D platformer style.

All of the visiuals are handmade.

Hope you will like it too.

GameJam Team

Selin Öksüz, Taylan Duran, Eren Boğatepe, Birkan Deniz, Kaan, Samet, İrem
